description: This table holds the numeric comparison information for electronic prior authorization questions.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SING_COMP_OP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the comparison operator to use when doing a single numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Equal to


Not equal to


Greater than


Greater than or equal to


Less than


Less than or equal to


In range


Not in range


Always equal to


No values equal to


Always greater than


Always greater than or equal to


Always less than


Always less than or equal to


Contains


Does not contain


Starts with


Ends with


Exists


Does not exist


Field is blank


Field does not contain

columns.name: SING_COMP_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the comparison value to use when doing a single numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_OP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the lower comparison operator to use when doing a range numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SING_COMP_OP_C_NAME

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the lower comparison value to use when doing a range numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_OP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the upper comparison operator to use when doing a range numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SING_COMP_OP_C_NAME

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the upper comparison value to use when doing a range numeric comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: NUM_COMP_NEXT_QUESN
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the next question to show after a numeric question meets the numeric comparison requirements.
